title: Veronica's Place
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Juice bar, Caribbean
description: Veronica's Place returned to this original location in 2014. In the morning it offer an Afro-Caribbean breakfast, and for lunch and dinner an Afro-Caribbean vegan buffet with 1 day in advance notice. Also offers cooking classes, health consultations, tours, transportation, hostel, and accommodation. Directions: from bus stop walk 100m inland, then left to go down the main street (with the ocean on your left) toward El Diamante Supermarket, once you are at Diamante go 50m further, take a right on a small paved road, pass Joe's Snack Point, go 1.5 block, and you will see it on your left.
streetAddress: Main St, Puerto Viejo de Talamanca
